trans-unit.target: SQL Server 結構描述比較

trans-unit.source: SQL Server Schema Compare for Azure Data Studio supports comparing the schemas of databases and dacpacs.
trans-unit.target: Azure Data Studio 的 SQL Server 結構描述比較支援比較資料庫和 dacpac 的結構描述。

trans-unit.source: A different source schema has been selected. Compare to see the comparison?
trans-unit.target: 已選取其他來源結構描述。要比較以查看比較結果嗎?

trans-unit.source: A different target schema has been selected. Compare to see the comparison?
trans-unit.target: 已選取其他目標結構描述。要比較以查看比較結果嗎?

trans-unit.source: Different source and target schemas have been selected. Compare to see the comparison?
trans-unit.target: 已選取不同的來源和結構描述。要比較以查看比較結果嗎?

trans-unit.source: Options have changed. Recompare to see the comparison?
trans-unit.target: 選項已變更。要重新比較以查看比較嗎?

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to update the target?
Press Compare to refresh the comparison.
trans-unit.target: 按下 [比較] 即可重新整理比較結果。

trans-unit.source: Generate script to deploy changes to target
trans-unit.target: 產生指令碼以將變更部署至目標
沒有任何要套用的變更

trans-unit.source: Please note that include/exclude operations can take a moment to calculate affected dependencies
trans-unit.target: 請注意，包含/排除作業可能需要一些時間來計算受影響的相依性
來源和目標之間的比較

trans-unit.source: Initializing Comparison. This might take a moment.
trans-unit.target: 正在將比較結果初始化。這可能需要一些時間。

trans-unit.source: To compare two schemas, first select a source schema and target schema, then press Compare.
trans-unit.target: 若要比較兩個結構描述，請先選取來源結構描述，然後按下 [比較]。
找不到任何結構描述差異。

trans-unit.source: Generate script is enabled when the target is a database
trans-unit.target: 當目標為資料庫時，會啟用產生指令碼

trans-unit.source: Apply is enabled when the target is a database
trans-unit.target: 當目標為資料庫時會啟用套用

trans-unit.source: Cannot exclude {0}. Included dependents exist, such as {1}
trans-unit.target: 無法排除 {0}。包含的相依性已存在，例如 {1}

trans-unit.source: Cannot include {0}. Excluded dependents exist, such as {1}
trans-unit.target: 不無法包含 {0}。排除的相依性已存在，例如 {1}
無法排除 {0}。包含的相依性已存在
無法包含 {0}。排除的相依性已存在

trans-unit.source: Load source, target, and options saved in an .scmp file
trans-unit.target: 載入儲存在 .scmp 檔案中的來源、目標和選項

trans-unit.source: Save source and target, options, and excluded elements
trans-unit.target: 儲存來源和目標、選項及排除的元素

trans-unit.source: Do you want to connect to {0}?

trans-unit.target: 忽略陳述式之間的分號

trans-unit.source: Ignore Object Placement On Partition Scheme
trans-unit.target: 忽略磁碟分割配置上的物件放置
忽略全文檢索目錄 FilePath
忽略 With Nocheck On ForeignKeys
指令碼新增條件約束驗證
執行部署計劃執行程式
註冊 DataTier 應用程式
填入檔案群組上的檔案

trans-unit.source: No Alter Statements To Change Clr Types
trans-unit.target: 不更改陳述式以變更 Cir 類型

trans-unit.source: Allow Unsafe Row Level Security Data Movement
trans-unit.target: 允許不安全的資料列層級安全性資料移動

trans-unit.source: Ignore With No check On Check Constraints
trans-unit.target: 忽略 With No check On Check 條件約束

trans-unit.source: Do Not Alter Change Data Capture Objects
trans-unit.target: 不要更改異動資料擷取物件
停用再重新啟用 Ddl 觸發程序

trans-unit.source: Deploy Database In Single User Mode
trans-unit.target: 在單一使用者模式中部署資料庫
使用目標定序進行比較
Comment Out Set Var 宣告
於可能遺失資料時封鎖
捨棄不在來源中的條件約束

trans-unit.source: Drop Dml Triggers Not In Source
trans-unit.target: 捨棄不在來源中的 Dml 觸發程序

trans-unit.source: Drop Extended Properties Not In Source
trans-unit.target: 捨棄不在來源中的擴充屬性
捨棄不在來源中的索引

trans-unit.source: Ignore File And Log File Path
trans-unit.target: 忽略檔案和記錄檔路徑
忽略 Dml 觸發程序狀態
忽略 Dml 觸發程序順序
忽略 Ddl 觸發程序狀態
忽略 Ddl 觸發程序順序
忽略密碼編譯提供者 FilePath
捨棄不在來源中的統計資料

trans-unit.source: Drop Role Members Not In Source
trans-unit.target: 捨棄不在來源中的角色成員
捨棄不在來源中的權限
捨棄不在來源中的物件
使用者定義的資料類型
使用者定義的資料表類型
Clr 使用者定義的類型

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether differences in the table options will be ignored or updated when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發佈至資料庫時，應該忽略或更新資料表選項的差異。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether differences in the semi-colons between T-SQL statements will be ignored or updated when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發佈至資料庫時，應該忽略或更新 T-SQL 陳述式間之分號的差異。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether differences in the amount of time that SQL Server retains the route in the routing table should be ignored or updated when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發行至資料庫時，應該忽略或更新 SQL Server 將路由保留在路由表中之時間長短的差異。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether differences in the role membership of logins should be ignored or updated when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發佈至資料庫時，應該忽略或更新登入之角色成員資格的差異。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether differences in the quoted identifiers setting should be ignored or updated when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發佈至資料庫時，應該忽略或更新引號識別碼設定的差異。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether permissions should be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否應該忽略權限。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether differences in partition schemes and functions should be ignored or updated when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發佈至資料庫時，應該忽略或更新資料分割配置和函數的差異。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether an object's placement on a partition scheme should be ignored or updated when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發行至資料庫時，應該忽略或更新物件在資料分割配置上的位置。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the not for replication settings should be ignored or updated when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發佈至資料庫時，要忽略或更新不可複寫設定。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether differences in the security identification number (SID) should be ignored or updated when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發佈至資料庫時，應該忽略或更新安全性識別碼 (SID) 的差異。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether differences in the lock hints on indexes should be ignored or updated when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發佈至資料庫時，應該忽略或更新索引之鎖定提示的差異。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether differences in the casing of keywords should be ignored or updated when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發佈至資料庫時，應該忽略或更新關鍵字之大小寫的差異。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether differences in the index padding should be ignored or updated when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發佈至資料庫時，要忽略或更新索引填補的差異。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether differences in the index options should be ignored or updated when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發佈至資料庫時，是否要忽略或更新索引選項的差異。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether differences in the increment for an identity column should be ignored or updated when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發佈至資料庫時，應該忽略或更新識別欄位之增量的差異。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether differences in the seed for an identity column should be ignored or updated when you publish updates to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發佈更新至資料庫時，應該忽略或更新識別欄位之種子的差異。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether differences in the user settings objects will be ignored or updated when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發佈至資料庫時，是否要忽略或更新使用者設定物件的差異。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether differences in the file path for the full-text catalog should be ignored or whether a warning should be issued when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發行至資料庫時，應該忽略全文檢索目錄之檔案路徑的差異或應該發出警告。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether differences in white space will be ignored or updated when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發佈至資料庫時，要忽略或更新空白字元的差異。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether differences in the value of the WITH NOCHECK clause for foreign keys will be ignored or updated when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發行至資料庫時，將忽略或更新外部索引鍵之 WITH NOCHECK 子句值的差異。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether collation compatibility is verified.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否驗證定序相容性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether warnings should be generated when differences are found in objects that cannot be modified, for example, if the file size or file paths were different for a file.
trans-unit.target: 指定在無法修改的物件中發現差異時 (例如檔案的檔案大小或檔案路徑不同) 是否應該產生警告。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether errors encountered during publish verification should be treated as warnings. The check is performed against the generated deployment plan before the plan is executed against your target database. Plan verification detects problems such as the loss of target-only objects (such as indexes) that must be dropped to make a change. Verification will also detect situations where dependencies (such as a table or view) exist because of a reference to a composite project, but do not exist in the target database. You might choose to do this to get a complete list of all issues, instead of having the publish action stop on the first error.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否應該將發行驗證期間所發生的錯誤視為警告。系統會先針對產生的部署計畫執行檢查，之後再針對您的目標資料庫執行計畫。計畫驗證會偵測出遺漏僅限於目標的物件 (例如索引) 這類必須卸除後才能進行變更的問題。驗證也會偵測因為參考複合物件而有相依性 (例如資料表或檢視) 存在，但是卻不存在目標資料庫中的情況。您可以選擇執行這個動作，以取得所有問題的清單，而不讓發行動作在第一次錯誤時就停止。

trans-unit.source: Include refresh statements at the end of the publish script.
trans-unit.target: 在發佈指令碼的結尾包含重新整理陳述式。

trans-unit.source: At the end of publish all of the constraints will be verified as one set, avoiding data errors caused by a check or foreign key constraint in the middle of publish. If set to False, your constraints will be published without checking the corresponding data.
trans-unit.target: 在發行結束時，系統會將所有條件約束當做單一集合進行驗證，避免檢查或外部索引鍵條件約束在發行進行中導致資料錯誤。如果設定為 False，系統將會發行您的條件約束，但不檢查對應的資料。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether size is specified when adding a file to a filegroup.
trans-unit.target: 控制將檔案加入 filegroup 時是否指定大小。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether statements are generated in the publish script to verify that the database name and server name match the names specified in the database project.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否在發行指令碼中產生陳述式，來驗證資料庫名稱和伺服器名稱是否符合資料庫專案中指定的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether target database properties should be set or updated as part of the publish action.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否要在執行發佈動作時，設定或更新目標資料庫屬性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether differences in the database compatibility should be ignored or updated when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發佈至資料庫時，要忽略或更新資料庫相容性的差異。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether differences in the database collation should be ignored or updated when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發佈至資料庫時，要忽略或更新資料庫定序的差異。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether DeploymentPlanExecutor contributors should be run when other operations are executed.
trans-unit.target: 指定其他作業執行時，是否應該執行 DeploymentPlanExecutor 參與者。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the schema is registered with the database server.
trans-unit.target: 指定結構描述是否向資料庫伺服器註冊。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether a new file is also created when a new FileGroup is created in the target database.
trans-unit.target: 指定在目標資料庫中建立新 FileGroup 時，是否一併建立新檔案。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that publish should always drop and re-create an assembly if there is a difference instead of issuing an ALTER ASSEMBLY statement
trans-unit.target: 指定發佈應在有差異時一律捨棄並重新建立組件，而非發出 ALTER ASSEMBLY 陳述式

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether transactional statements should be used where possible when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發佈至資料庫時，是否應該盡可能地使用交易陳述式。

trans-unit.source: Include all composite elements as part of a single publish operation.
trans-unit.target: 將所有複合項目加入單一發佈作業中。

trans-unit.source: Do not block data motion on a table which has Row Level Security if this property is set to true. Default is false.
trans-unit.target: 若此屬性設定為 True，請勿封鎖具有資料列層級安全性之資料表的資料移動 (data motion)。預設為 False。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether differences in the value of the WITH NOCHECK clause for check constraints will be ignored or updated when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發行至資料庫時，將忽略或更新檢查條件約束之 WITH NOCHECK 子句值的差異。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether differences in the fill factor for index storage should be ignored or whether a warning should be issued when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發行至資料庫時，應該忽略索引儲存體之填滿因數的差異或應該發出警告。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether differences in the file sizes should be ignored or whether a warning should be issued when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發行至資料庫時，應該忽略檔案大小的差異或應該發出警告。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether differences in the placement of objects in FILEGROUPs should be ignored or updated when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發佈至資料庫時，應該忽略或更新 FILEGROUP 中物件位置的差異。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether objects that are replicated are identified during verification.
trans-unit.target: 指定驗證期間是否識別有複寫的物件。

trans-unit.source: If true, Change Data Capture objects are not altered.
trans-unit.target: 如果為 True，則不會改變變更資料擷取物件。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether Data Definition Language (DDL) triggers are disabled at the beginning of the publish process and re-enabled at the end of the publish action.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否在發行程序開始時停用 Data Definition Language (DDL) 觸發程序，並在發行動作結束時重新啟用。

trans-unit.source: If true, the database is set to Single User Mode before deploying.
trans-unit.target: 若為 True，則會在部署前將資料庫設為單一使用者模式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the target database should be updated or whether it should be dropped and re-created when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發行至資料庫時，應該更新目標資料庫或應該卸除並重新建立目標資料庫。

trans-unit.source: This setting dictates how the database's collation is handled during deployment; by default the target database's collation will be updated if it does not match the collation specified by the source. When this option is set, the target database's (or server's) collation should be used.
trans-unit.target: 這項設定會指出部署期間的資料庫定序處理方式；根據預設，如果目標資料庫的定序與來源所指定的定序不相符，就會受到更新。設定此選項時，應使用目標資料庫 (或伺服器) 的定序。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the declaration of SETVAR variables should be commented out in the generated publish script. You might choose to do this if you plan to specify the values on the command line when you publish by using a tool such as SQLCMD.EXE.
trans-unit.target: 指定在產生的發行指令碼中是否應該將 SETVAR 變數的宣告標記為註解。如果您計畫在使用 SQLCMD.EXE 一類工具進行發行時在命令列指定值，就可以選擇這種作法。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to block updating a database whose schema no longer matches its registration or is unregistered.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否封鎖更新結構描述不再符合註冊或已取消註冊的資料庫。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the publish episode should be terminated if there is a possibility of data loss resulting from the publish operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定如果發佈作業可能導致資料遺失，就應該終止發佈事件。

trans-unit.source: Backups the database before deploying any changes.
trans-unit.target: 在部署任何變更之前，先備份資料庫。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to attempt the action despite incompatible SQL Server platforms.
trans-unit.target: 指定儘管 SQL Server 平台不相容，是否仍要嘗試動作。

trans-unit.source: This property is used by SqlClr deployment to cause any blocking assemblies to be dropped as part of the deployment plan. By default, any blocking/referencing assemblies will block an assembly update if the referencing assembly needs to be dropped.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是供 SqlClr 部署用來使任何封鎖的組件會在部署計畫中卸除。根據預設，如果必須卸除任何參考組件，則該封鎖/參考組件將會封鎖組件更新。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether constraints that do not exist in the database snapshot (.dacpac) file will be dropped from the target database when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發行至資料庫時，是否要從目標資料庫中卸除不存在資料庫快照集 (.dacpac) 檔案中的條件約束。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether DML triggers that do not exist in the database snapshot (.dacpac) file will be dropped from the target database when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發行至資料庫時，是否要從目標資料庫中卸除不存在資料庫快照集 (.dacpac) 檔案中的 DML 觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether extended properties that do not exist in the database snapshot (.dacpac) file will be dropped from the target database when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發行至資料庫時，是否要從目標資料庫中卸除不存在資料庫快照集 (.dacpac) 檔案中的擴充屬性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether indexes that do not exist in the database snapshot (.dacpac) file will be dropped from the target database when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發行至資料庫時，是否要從目標資料庫中卸除不存在資料庫快照集 (.dacpac) 檔案中的索引。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether differences in the paths for files and log files should be ignored or updated when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發佈至資料庫時，應該忽略或更新檔案和記錄檔之路徑的差異。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether extended properties should be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否應該忽略擴充屬性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether differences in the enabled or disabled state of DML triggers should be ignored or updated when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發行至資料庫時，應該忽略或更新 DML 觸發程序之啟用或停用狀態的差異。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether differences in the order of Data Manipulation Language (DML) triggers should be ignored or updated when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發行至資料庫時，應該忽略或更新 Data Manipulation Language (DML) triggers 的順序差異。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether differences in the default schema should be ignored or updated when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發佈至資料庫時，是否應忽略或更新預設結構描述中的差異。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether differences in the enabled or disabled state of Data Definition Language (DDL) triggers should be ignored or updated when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發行至資料庫時，應該忽略或更新 Data Definition Language (DDL) triggers 之啟用或停用狀態的差異。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether differences in the order of Data Definition Language (DDL) triggers should be ignored or updated when you publish to a database or server.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發行至資料庫或伺服器時，應該忽略或更新 Data Definition Language (DDL) triggers 的順序差異。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether differences in the file path for the cryptographic provider should be ignored or updated when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發佈至資料庫時，要忽略或更新密碼編譯提供者之檔案路徑的差異。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether checks should be performed before publishing that will stop the publish action if issues are present that might block successful publishing. For example, your publish action might stop if you have foreign keys on the target database that do not exist in the database project, and that will cause errors when you publish.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否應該先執行檢查，以防止發行因為出現阻止發行成功的問題而停止發行動作。例如，如果目標資料庫有不存在資料庫專案中的外部索引鍵，該外部索引鍵會在發行時造成錯誤，則您的發行動作就可能會停止。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether differences in the comments should be ignored or updated when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發佈至資料庫時，要忽略或更新註解的差異。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether differences in the column collations should be ignored or updated when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發佈至資料庫時，要忽略或更新資料行定序的差異。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether differences in the Authorizer should be ignored or updated when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發佈至資料庫時，要忽略或更新授權者的差異。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether differences in the ANSI NULLS setting should be ignored or updated when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發佈至資料庫時，應該忽略或更新 ANSI NULLS 設定的差異。

trans-unit.source: Automatically provides a default value when updating a table that contains data with a column that does not allow null values.
trans-unit.target: 在更新含有資料且資料行不允許 null 值的資料表時，自動提供預設值。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether statistics that do not exist in the database snapshot (.dacpac) file will be dropped from the target database when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發行至資料庫時，是否要從目標資料庫卸除不存在資料庫快照集 (.dacpac) 檔案中的統計資料。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether role members that are not defined in the database snapshot (.dacpac) file will be dropped from the target database when you publish updates to a database.</
trans-unit.target: 指定是否要在您對資料庫發佈更新時，將未於資料庫快照集 (.dacpac) 檔案中定義的角色成員從目標資料庫捨棄。</

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether permissions that do not exist in the database snapshot (.dacpac) file will be dropped from the target database when you publish updates to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發行更新至資料庫時，是否要從目標資料庫中卸除不存在資料庫快照集 (.dacpac) 檔案中的權限。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether objects that do not exist in the database snapshot (.dacpac) file will be dropped from the target database when you publish to a database. This value takes precedence over DropExtendedProperties.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發行至資料庫時，是否要從目標資料庫卸除不存在於資料庫快照集 (.dacpac) 檔案中的物件。這個值的優先順序高過 DropExtendedProperties。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether differences in table column order should be ignored or updated when you publish to a database.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您發佈至資料庫時，要略過或更新資料表資料行順序的差異。
取消結構描述比較失敗: '{0}'
結構描述比較套用失敗 '{0}'
